Plot: Three young people on a road trip from Colorado to New Jersey talk to a trucker on their CB radio, then must escape when he turns out to be a psychotic killer.
Title: Joy Ride
Actors: Steve Zahn, Paul Walker, Leelee Sobieski, Jessica Bowman
tomatoConsensus: A well-constructed B-movie thriller, Joy Ride keeps up the necessary level of tension and chills. Critics also liked Zahn's performance as the goofball older brother.
